data.message: So many people complained that they couldn't hear him Friday, seriously what the fuck! I was right near the front I could hear and I've seen people's vids at different areas of the stadium and still perfect sound! The guardian paper say we should get our money back. I don't want my money back! Eminem delivered the best! It was one night I will never forget. I'd waited since a kid to see the legend himself and finally I did and to top it off saw another legend too. Still feels like a dream! Only thing I wish I could complain about is i wish you could have been on longer haha! Please don't let it be another decade till you come back to london eminem we fucking love you!

replies.message: totally agree he smashed it and out on amazing show u always get dickheads who want to moan, hope he comes bk so i can see him for a 3rd time he's well worth it x
I think these people if they really didn't enjoy themself should have gone home if it was that "bad" there was worst shit going on there like the huge fight & people smoking weed! Xx
It was the first time i saw him and I feel people like the dickheads who complained let it down by slating him xx
well  if the sound been sorted it would  of been a great show ,,, of all the shows i been to ,, his sound was  shit

I went myself an was at the top, I struggled to hear him speaking clearly but that was nothing to do with him it's who ever set up his sound, Wembley arena are to blame. That being said I had the most amazing night. he didn't disappoint me one bit, but the arena did, also the screens where out by at least 2 seconds which was slightly annoying! Wembley need to sort it out.
I agree with Danielle. I was near the top too and thought all the same things!
I was some where in middle seats, and people ruined it by smoking weed?  Artists them self's were blazing up?  I just thought the 5 pound a pint was. The only downfall.
Jamez read properly I said there was worst things going on I didn't say that smoking weed ruined it. And that's standard at concerts paying stupid prices for beer hence why I bought none.
